name: Mycro
description:
At Triangle4 Studios, we have a team of misfits who excel at creating unique games.
During a change in management, a brand new platform concept was suggested by our CEO.
The Concept was to create a series of a cool, fun and unique games and offer them as part of a Steam package.
Rather than getting one game, you will be investing in several games at once!

As development progresses, some of these games will be added to the core game. What this means is they will be included without the need to purchase add-ons.
The game style, genre and content will vary greatly from game to game. For example, the first 4 games we are developing are:
  • - Electron - explore various levels as a free electron. Fight, bomb and fly through and defeat bosses and enemies.
  • - Contraption - A physics based
  • - Helix - A Digital DNA Simulator in which you fly along a massive 3D particle DNA strand, and fight enemies while you try to survive to the end.
  • - Lost - A maze game in which you navigate through a physics bending maze, fight flying robots and find you your way to the exit.
  • +28 more games in concept.

The first game, due to be released with the core game, is entitled 'Electron':

Electron (Included)


General Rules:
  • You are a free electron, lost in an anti-physical sub atomic universe.
  • Your objectives are simple
  • You must complete the level as fast as you can! You are competing with the Steam leader boards after all!
  • Destroy bosses, and enemies to gain points. Each hit will gain you points, and the faster you are moving when you hit them, the more points you will achieve.
  • After you destroy enough enemies and any bosses in the level, you can find your way to the fusion module to complete the level.
  • Each level contains its own unique challenges, enemies and bosses, in which you will have to defeat in order to complete the level.
  • The faster you complete each level, the higher your score, will will affect your global Steam rankings for the game.
  • You can teleport, launch bombs, missiles and various other weapons, and unleash all manner of destruction to find your path to victory.
  • If you run out of energy, you will surely die.
  • If you hit with an electron burst, you will surely die
  • If you hit with an electron bomb, you will surely die
  • If you run out of time you, will surely die.
  • If you stop moving, you will surely die.
  • If you collide with a wall, you will surely die.
  • If you with collide with an antiparticle, you will surely die.
  • If you die, you must start the level again.
  • If you have no lives left and you die, the game is over and you must begin again from the first level.

Scoring:
  • Points are earned earned for each unique orbital visited.
  • By Visiting booster orbitals, often in dangerous locations. These give massive points.
  • Points can be used at the end of the level to buy extra spawn, ammo, or to increase your maximum energy.
  • Your total accumulated points is your global Steam score, and will determine your real world ranking.
  • Your time left contributes to your final points.

Early Access Plans:
Over the course of a few months, more levels, bug fixes, additional bosses, themes, mods and other features will be made available in regular updates!!
